titleStmt.title: Sober sadnes: or Historicall observations vpon the proceedings, pretences, & designs of a prevailing party in both Houses of Parliament. With the resolution of all loyall subjects, and true Protestants of the Church of England thereupon.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Webb Book-seller, neer Queens Colledge,

notesStmt.note: There is a good deal of detailed information in his book, which is clearly the work of a Royalist in close touch with affairs in London, cf. Madan.
Attributed to Laurence Womock. cf. BM.
Illustration facing t.p., having caption in banner: Estote proditores Betraye your Country.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
